segments.text: I've brought this dress back to exchange it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's not a problem . Leave it with me , and find something that you like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping you'd have something on sale today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have nothing on sale today . But we're having a big sale next weekend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the sale going to include dresses ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Everything you can see will be on sale .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like the sound of that . I'll just come back next weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The savings will be worth the short wait . See you next weekend .
segments.speaker: S2
